component.text: Creates a login name and password for authentication.

Allows the user to open a Telnet connection to the router. The dynamic ACL entry is ignored until lock-and-key is triggered. The window will be opened for 15 minutes and then automatically close whether it is being used or not.

Once the user is authenticated using Telnet, the autocommand command executes and the Telnet session terminates. The user can now access network 192.168.30.0. If there is up to 5 minutes of inactivity, the window will close.
Roll over each step for more information.
